meanings.definition: Giving new strength or energy to; reinvigorating.
meanings.sent1: After a long nap, she felt refreshing and ready to play.
meanings.sent2: The cool breeze on a hot day is always refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The energetic puppy was a refreshing sight after a dull day.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude was like a refreshing drink for the team.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise over the mountains was a truly refreshing experience.

meanings.sent1: The colorful flowers in the garden looked refreshing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: A glass of lemonade on a summer day is so refreshing.
meanings.sent3: Her unique fashion sense was a refreshing change from the norm.
meanings.sent4: The new student brought a refreshing perspective to the class discussion.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children is always a refreshing sound in the park.

meanings.sent1: The cold water from the fountain was so refreshing after the hike.
meanings.sent2: A quick break can be refreshing and help clear the mind.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected compliment was a refreshing boost to her confidence.
